title: Bering Land Bridge National Preserve: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery               Have you taken any impressive shots at Serpentine Hot Springs or the Maar Lakes? Share your own Bering Land Bridge photos through our Flickr group.                   Tundra Plants   10 Photos  View photos of Alaskan wildflowers and tundra plants native to the preserve.          Landscape Scenics   20 Photos  Images of the vast rolling tundra, sandy coatline, lava flows, and mountian peaks.          Wildlife   11 Photos  Wildlife
